meaningMnemonic: If you see someone <radical>loiter</radical>ing around with <radical>horns</radical> on their head you'd be <radical>correct</radical> to <kanji>obey</kanji> and <kanji>accompany</kanji> them.
readingMnemonic: If you <kanji>obey</kanji> the horned man you'll end up with a ton of <reading>jew</reading>els (じゅう)!
